decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed rear extension taken in combination with the front extension would, by reason of inappropriate design and scale would result in a bulky and incongruous form of development which would be harmful to the character and appearance of the original dwellinghouse and streetscene by reason of overdevelopment failing to adhere to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D3 (D(1) and (11)) of The London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 A, DM1 B (a), (b) and (c) of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).

Reason : 2 - The proposed rear extension taken in combination with the front extension would, by reason of inappropriate design and scale would result in a bulky and incongruous form of development which would be harmful to the character and appearance of the original dwellinghouse and streetscene by reason of overdevelopment failing to adhere to the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D3 (D(1) and (11)) of The London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 A, DM1 B (a), (b) and (c) of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).
description: Two storey front extension; single storey rear extension; external alterations (demolition of front porch; entrance canopy and front bay windows)
